item.title: Disabled form controls and how to tackle them
item.content:encoded: Find out how to use the HTML disabled boolean attribute, toggle it with JavaScript and style disabled form controls.

item.title: HTML replaced and void elements
item.content:encoded: Learn more about the HTML replaced and void elements and visualize the intersection of these two HTML elements sets using a Venn diagram.

item.title: Light and dark themed SVG favicon using the CSS prefers-color-scheme media feature
item.content:encoded: How to use an SVG as a favicon for your website, considering the light and dark theme detection in the browser using the CSS prefers-color-scheme media feature, with PNG and ICO fallbacks.

item.title: The current DOM node in browser’s console
item.content:encoded: Find out how to get the current DOM node, React and Vue.js components or current Angular scope in order to speed up debugging in the browser console.

item.title: How to copy to the clipboard using JS and the Clipboard API
item.content:encoded: Find out how to copy to the clipboard using JS and the modern asynchronous Clipboard API.

item.title: CSS resize none on textarea is bad for UX
item.content:encoded: Some people decide to remove the textarea resize handle using the CSS resize none declaration and that is a bad thing for UX.

item.title: An SEO story on the website name from the Google SERP
item.content:encoded: I didn't add a website name within the title tag for my website, then I switched to a new domain and Google was showing my old website name references in the SERP.

item.title: Fancy new selectors within groups can break your CSS rule
item.content:encoded: Fancy new selectors within groups can break your CSS rule if just one of these selectors is invalid or if the browser doesn't recognize it.

item.title: The 3-in-1 full-stack developer
item.content:encoded: The 3-in-1 full-stack developer wording is weird, at least.

item.title: SVG icon system within Pug/Jade
item.content:encoded: How to include a minified, production-ready SVG icon system, using symbols within the Pug/Jade pages.
